Projects.Name: Amazon.Lambda.Core
ChangelogMessages: Add the InternalsVisibleToAttribute to the renamed version of Amazon.Lambda.RuntimeSupport embedded with the Lambda Test Tool

Projects.Name: Amazon.Lambda.RuntimeSupport
ChangelogMessages: Add defensive checks for older versions of Amazon.Lambda.Core being used in Lambda function using the renamed version embedded in the Lambda Test Tool

Projects.Name: Amazon.Lambda.TestTool
ChangelogMessages: Rename embedded Amazon.Lambda.RuntimeSupport assembly to Amazon.Lambda.RuntimeSupport.TestTool to avoid conflicts with Lambda function that might include Amazon.Lambda.RuntimeSupport
